title: Employee Inventory Management (f/m)
description:
We are the official distributor of Spare Parts and Accessories for KIA and HYUNDAI Motors in Central and Eastern Europe.
Currently we are looking to fill a vacancy for a position of controlling within our Purchase Department in order to ensure the smooth running of operational logistics in the process of supplying spare parts on behalf of KIA-Motors and Hyundai. To support the processes of our new European organisation at our subsidiary in Brehna, we are looking to recruit a:

*Employee Inventory Management (f/m)*

Functional areas:
* Weekly stock order placement
* Emergency order placement to avoid backorder in advance
* Emergency/Vehicle off road order placement to solve backorder
* Order placement to other subsidiaries for stock and backorder reason
* Checking purchase order confirmation for cancelation and replaced parts
* Initial order placement and follow up
* Reports (daily, weekly, monthly)
* In charge of stock transfer between warehouse and offsite warehouse
* Checking status of parts which are in disposition
* Checking and confirming part request from other subsidiaries
* Solving problematic backorder due to supply unit code, unknown price or wrong supplier

*Candidate profile:*
* Business administration or commercial training
* Strong understanding of Inventory Management
* Experience with/Identification ability to Automotive business
* Excellent knowledge of computer programs, especially database query tool programs like Excel and Access
* Fluent in spoken and written English
* Excellent numeric and analytical skills
* Good skills in coordination, negotiation and time management
* Ability to work independently, while having the capacity for teamwork

*We offer:*
* Salary in line with your experience
* Becoming part of a growing multi-cultural team

Arbeitszeit: 38 Std. (Vollzeit)
Startzeitpunkt: ab sofort
Voraussetzung: Führerschein und eigener PKW

For any additional information we like to invite you at our website: http://www.mobisparts.de
how_to_apply:
Thank you for applying to MOBIS Parts Europe N.V. - a growing company within the Automotive sector. Please send us your cover letter, CV and all necessary certificates (email: maren.billian@mobisparts.de).
We aim to respond as promptly as possible to your application, however, due to the high level of CV's we receive, this process can take some time. Please be advised that documents will be treated in the strictest of confidence.
